title: Digital FX
subtitle: Understand how exchange rates are priced. No secrets.

auditSummary.title: Audit Summary
auditSummary.conclusion: All providers start from the same market reference. The difference is the settlement structure: number of intermediaries, where fees are embedded, and how taxes apply. Coins focuses on market execution with fewer layers, making costs visible and measurable.

costStack.title: Where Each Provider Takes Their Cut
costStack.insight: Each intermediary adds costs. Coins reduces intermediaries, letting more of your money arrive.

stablecoinRail.title: What is a Stablecoin Settlement Rail?
stablecoinRail.movesValue: Moves value like a wire transfer, but with fewer intermediaries
stablecoinRail.insight: Stablecoin is not a 'bet'. It's settlement infrastructure. USDT is dollar-pegged and used for settlement between markets.

pathOfMoney.title: The Path of Your Money
pathOfMoney.description: GBP → FX Market → Bank/Wise/Coins Route → Local Bank/SWIFT

impactOfSpreads.title: The Impact of Wide Spreads

whyIOFVaries.title: Why IOF Tax Varies
whyIOFVaries.description: Foreign Banks = 3.5% IOF vs Local Settlement = ~1.0% IOF
